title: Rebel
description: Rebel is a type of illustration genre created and continuously developed by Artmazigh Studio. The rebel genre is mostly chosen by those who want to create or actualize crazy ideas and imaginations about the world which are often against the existing order (anti-mainstream). The rebel genre illustration is made by prioritizing stroke details, compositions, and colors. The aim is to make the illustrations represent the energy from the ideas and crazy imaginations of the imaginators (clients) accurately.

title: Cyberpunk
description: Cyberpunk is not only a genre in illustration art. It is a cultural movement that touches almost all arts and entertainment products such as; film, photography, animation, comics, novels, poetry, architecture, fashion, games etc. This genre is mostly chosen by those who want to actualize the imagination of human life in the future which is filled with various high technologies. Cyberpunk is very close to the sci-fi genre. At Artmazigh, cyberpunk is one of the genres that is ordered by many imaginators. It proves that we have succeeded in developing a cyberpunk drawing technique that is unique and has a special vibe to it.

title: Dark Art
description: Dark art is one of the illustration genres that is often associated with images of chaos, horror, gothic, metaphysical, nightmares and is even considered very close to surrealism. At Artmazigh studio, we have special illustrators who are very competent in drawing this genre. We have special artists in Dark Art because this genre was created by not only involving the skills of drawing techniques (scratches, compositions, colors, spaces and textures) but also the illustrators’ ability to explore the imagination described by the imaginators. To us, Dark Art is a very special illustration art.

title: Traditional Tattoo
description: Traditional tattoo design usually depicts and emphasizes the traditional or legend stories from specific places or ethnic groups. Artmazigh is always try the best to learn the story behind the concept to make the design as close as the original stories and details. We keep it simple yet detailed.

title: Japan Style
description: Japan style is an illustration genre that has very complex drawing techniques. This genre requires a special ability to combine all elements of illustrations (object shapes, compositions, use of colors and stroke techniques) to form what is known as the Japanese universe. We have been struggling for 10 years with Japanese style and during that time we have produced thousands of illustrations with various themes ranging from Japanese Pop Art, Japanese Classical Art, Manga, Anime, Japanese Cyberpunk, Japanese Cross Culture (a combination of Japanese culture and Japanese culture) and many more.

title: Band’s Merchandise
description: This gig will help you to promote your band and make your fans scream and want more! Showing the different and unique sides of your band will make the design feel very special and close to your fans’ hearts. Your lyrics can be something special for the design, too. Don’t hesitate to pour your passion and love through the design!

title: Automotive Designs
description: Automotive design is the design that focuses on showing the features of the vehicles. We always do our best to show the best side of the clients’ vehicles. Our clients are ranging from bike or car communities, racers and many more.

title: Logo Design
description: Logo plays an important role for product’s branding. A unique and catchy logo will help customers to recognize your brand or products easily. We always make logo designs that represent the customers’ brands and products to help them spread their markets widely.

title: Children’s Book Illustration
description: It has been said that children are easily engaged with books if the illustrations inside the books are interesting, colorful and the story is understandable. We always discuss with the clients and do our best to create illustrations that can help children to have a better understanding of what they are reading

title: Album and Podcast Covers
description: Music is one of the most popular works of art in the world that is listened to, sung and produced. Considering the existence of music, we opened a gig about music illustration (album cover) and we have collaborated with many musicians from various genres to help them create illustrations that are able to properly represent their music.

title: Rebel Cartoon
description: Rebel cartoon is one type of illustration that explores the shape of cartoon and anime characters a lot. This illustration becomes interesting because it is presented based on the imagination of the imaginator which is often contrary to the general appearance, bringing up various impressions that are very unique, characterized and often unexpected.

title: NFT
description: NFTs or non-fungible tokens are well-known digital assets that most people are very familiar with. Individuals to big brands have ordered their NFTs from us. We made each NFT very special, unique and eye-catching so they will be liked by many people

title: Animation
description: In accordance with its name, the animation video is a media that combines the audio and visual to attract people who see it. We make the animation video as wonderful as possible by giving special effects and sounds to it. Our team can do it from scratch by making the logo first if you don’t have the logo yet. Artmazigh team is ready to jaw-dropping your targeted customers with our skills.
